so here's the solution to play this game:

click onto the "blue box" with right click and then choose "show package contents" then go to recources and unpack "Tome.7z" (with Winzip or something) then just double-click on the AoE Icon in the New Folder. Have Fun ;)

NOTE: The Game is very Dark in the selection screens but in the real game it's as bright as the monitor itself
